metadata.title: Benthic Organisms Database

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data
Information Service (NESDIS), National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC)

metadata.description: To provide a database of bottom dwelling organisms collected by the Outer Continental Shelf Environmental Assessment Program (OCSEAP).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide a database of bottom dwelling organisms collected by the Outer Continental Shelf Environmental Assessment Program (OCSEAP).

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: As Needed
